MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH45 postcode area of Wallasey, affecting properties in Withens Lane, Bridgecroft Road and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of network investigations and repair on the underground cable network required. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:24PM on 18th October 2020.
